name: ROON
description:
That shiny statue looks valuable...

ROON is an excruciatingly hard game where you run around, dodging boulders, arrows and more, collecting as much sweet loot as you can!

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, Space to jump.

This game is not perfect (it's in development), so i would appreciate any feedback you guys have!

The music is Ancient Temple by Dominik Hauser
